keyMappings:
# Emacs god-mode keybindings for firefox

unmapAll

# Navigating the current page
map h showHelp
map n scrollDown
map p scrollUp
map >f scrollRight
map >b scrollLeft
map .< scrollToTop
map .> scrollToBottom
map v scrollFullPageDown
map .v scrollFullPageUp
map cf LinkHints.activateMode
map cF LinkHints.activateModeWithQueue
map .r reload
map .s viewSource
map cu copyCurrentUrl
map cl LinkHints.activateModeToCopyLinkUrl
map x<space>o nextFrame

# Navigating to new pages
map x<space>f Vomnibar.activate
map xf Vomnibar.activateInNewTab
map xb Vomnibar.activateBookmarks
map xB Vomnibar.activateBookmarksInNewTab

# Using find
map s enterFindMode
map <down> performFind
map <up> performBackwardsFind

# Navigating history
map .b goBack
map .f goForward

# Manipulating tabs
map b previousTab
map f nextTab
map x<up> firstTab
map x<down> lastTab
map ct createTab
map x4 duplicateTab
map x0 removeTab
map cr restoreTab
map x<space>b Vomnibar.activateTabSelection
map x5 moveTabToNewWindow
map .p togglePinTab

# Using marks
#map m Marks.activateCreateMode
#map ` Marks.activateGotoMode

# Additional browsing commands
map c<left> goNext
map c<right> goPrevious
map c<space>f focusInput
map c< goUp
map c/ goToRoot
map x< scrollToLeft
map x> scrollToRight
